Package gameinterfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Battle  
    Creature
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: name: String description: String hitPoints: int damage: int room: Room The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Creature(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage) room should be initialized to null provide getters for the following attributes: name, description, hitPoints, damage, Room.
    Game
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: player: Player dungeon: Room[] The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Game(): 1.
    Monster
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: isEnraged: boolean enrageThreshold: int The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Monster(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage, int enrageThreshold)
    Player
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: healAmount: int The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Player(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage, int healAmount)
    Room
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: roomIndex: int description: String monster: Monster The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Room(int roomIndex, String description, Monster monster)
    TreasureRoom
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: treasure: String The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public TreasureRoom(String description, Monster monster, String treasure)
